participant_1.background:
I love to read so my ideal lunch date would be with an author.
i like meat too much.
i am going bald.
i am married with 2 kids.
when people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me.

participant_2.background:
I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I love my Acara, it's round and comfortable.
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I spend most of my free time exercising, working in my workshop or watching Nascar.  Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, and my ideal lunch date would be with an author.  I also like to go on hikes with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  Do you have any favorite authors?
I enjoy reading a lot of different types of books, but I'm particularly fond of historical fiction.  What kind of books do you like to read?
I mostly read non-fiction books about history or science.  I also enjoy reading biographies of famous people.
I've been meaning to read more non-fiction books.  I have a couple of biographies on my to-read list.
That's great!  I hope you enjoy them.
Well, it was nice chatting with you.  I'm going to go finish up some work in my shop now.  Have a great day!
